original_title: Phil Collins: Live and Loose in Paris
overview: Hand in hand - Hang in long enough - Don't loose my number - Another day in paradise - Against all odds - Lorenzo - Separate lives - Long long way to go - In the air tonight - Timbantiocha - Easy lover - Dance into the light - Wear my hat - Something happened on the way to heaven - Sussudio
title: Phil Collins: Live and Loose in Paris
